Document:
# List of Restricted Items
[color=lightblue][bold]OOC[/bold]: It is strongly recommended to increase the size of your guidebook window when viewing this page.[/color]
## Contraband (NE)
Type of Contraband Examples Hostile corporation branded objects. Generally anything that carries a Syndicate, Cybersun, Gorlax, Spider Clan, or blood-red branding. Hijacked NT technology. Anything made by Nanotrasen that has been modified to function differently. Illegal weaponry. C-20rs, Cobras, China-Lakes, Gloves of the North Star, Vipers, Bulldogs, L6 SAWs, and Pythons. Syndicate made explosives. Minibombs, hardbombs, whitehole grenades, and grenade penguins. Syndicate made armor. Web vests. Weaponized energy technology. Energy blades, and energy shields. Deception equipment. Unrestricted chameleon technology, and voice synthesizers. Thieving technology. Thieving gloves. Hacking and tamper technology. EMAGs, power sinks, and radio jammers. Invisibility technology. Anything that turns itself or another thing invisible. Electromagnetic pulse technology. Anything that causes an EMP. Illegal implants. Holoparasites, scram implants, and freedom implants. Syndicate made chemicals. Nocturine, Lexorin, Hyperzine, and Tazinide.
## Restricted Gear
Allowed Departments Type of Gear Examples Exceptions \[[color=#1b6475]Command[/color]/[color=#cd0000]Security[/color]/[color=#c96dbf]Science[/color]\] Handheld flashing technology
\[[color=#1b6475]Command[/color]/[color=#f39f27]Engineering[color]\] Fire axes
\[[color=#f39f27]Engineering[color]\] Engineering goggles
\[[color=#f39f27]Engineering[color]\] Rapid Construction Devices
\[[color=#f39f27]Engineering[color]\] Jaws of life
\[[color=#b18644]Salvage[/color]\] Standard salvage weaponry. Crusher weapons, PKAs, and survival knives
\[[color=#b18644]Salvage[/color]\] Seismic charges
\[[color=#b18644]Salvage[/color]\] Fulton devices. Fulton beacons, and fultons
\[[color=#c96dbf]Science[/color]\] Experimental technology. Quantum spin inverters, speed boots, and blue-space backpacks
\[[color=#c96dbf]Science[/color]\] Scientific production fabricators. Protolathes, circuit imprinters, and exosuit fabricators.
\[[color=#c96dbf]Science[/color]/[color=#cd0000]Security[color]\] H.A.R.M.P.A.C.K.s.
\[[color=#cd0000]Security[/color]\] Advanced flashing technology. Flashbangs, and mounted auto flashers
\[[color=#cd0000]Security[/color]\] Combat knives
\[[color=#cd0000]Security[/color]\] Riot control grenades. Tear gas, and stingers
\[[color=#cd0000]Security[/color]\] Restraining gear. Handcuffs, zip ties, bolas, and improvised restraints
\[[color=#cd0000]Security[/color]\] Chest rigs and protective armor. Security webbing, helmets, and armored vests. [color=#134975]Captain's[/color] carapace. [color=#9fed58]Bartender's[/color] vest. \[[color=#cd0000]Security[/color]\] Physical shields. Riot, telescopic, and improvised shields
\[[color=#cd0000]Security[/color]\] Stun technology. Disablers, stun batons, and disabler SMGs. [color=#134975]Captain's[/color] disabler. Head of Personnel's disabler. \[[color=#cd0000]Security[/color]\] Security heads-up displays. Security glasses, and security HUDs
\[[color=#cd0000]Security[/color]\] Breaching explosives. Explosive cord, detonator caps, and breaching charges.
\[[color=#cd0000]Security[/color]\] Ballistic and laser firearms. Handguns, rifles, laser guns, and shotguns. [color=#134975]Captain's[/color] laser pistol. [color=#9fed58]Bartender's[/color] shotgun. \[[color=#cd0000]Security[/color]\] Firearm and ammunition fabricators. Security techfabs, and ammo techfabs.
\[[color=#cd0000]Security[/color]/Service: Bar\] Beanbag shotgun shells
\[Service: Kitchen\] Cooking knives. Kitchen knives, and butcher cleavers
\[Contextual\] Departmental or job clothes. Wearable equipment showing department or job insignia.
\[Contextual\] Departmental or job access. ID cards with department or Head of Staff access. [color=#9fed58]Lawyer's[/color] brig access. [color=#134975]Command's[/color] brig access. \[Contextual\] Departmental encryption keys. Radio encryption keys belonging to certain departments. [color=#9fed58]Lawyer's[/color] security key. \[None\] Improvised deadly weaponry. Baseball bats, shivs, and spears
\[None\] Other bladed objects. Swords, and non-departmental knives. [color=#134975]Captain's[/color] sabre. \[None\] Other explosives. IEDs, mines, grenades, and C4
\[[color=#009100]CC[/color]/[color=134975]ERT[/color]\] Any CC or ERT branded gear. Uniforms, vests, backpacks, and headgear
## Controlled Substances
Type of Substance Examples Exceptions High-grade painkillers. Soretizone, and Agonolexyne. Medical prescriptions. High-grade antidepressants. Neurozenium, and Blissifylovene. Medical prescriptions. High-grade anxiety medication. Tranquiase, and Equilibrazine Medical prescriptions. Vomit inducers. Ipecac. Medical operations. Sedatives. Pax, Chloral Hydrate, and Nitrous Oxide. Medical operations. Sensory inhibitors. Mute toxin, and Norepinephric Acid
Psychedelics. Space Mirage, Happiness, and Mindbreaker. THC. Stimulants. Desoxyephedrine
Unstable lazarus chemicals. Romerol.
Genetic mutatives. Unstable Mutagen. Botanical operations. Hazardous toxins. Amatoxin, Heartbreaker, Licoxide, and many more
Pyrotechnics. Napalm, CLF3, and Thermite. Welding fuel. Dangerous gasses. Frezon, plasma, and tritium. Atmospheric operations. Research operations.
